original_text: Since then, he waits for God to win against his enemies completely. They will become like a place for him to put his feet. Since then, he waits for God to win against his enemies completely. They will become like a place for him to put his feet.
korean_text: 그 후에 자기 원수들을 자기 발등상이 되게 하실 때까지 기다리시나니

sentences.original_text: Since then, he waits for God
to win against his enemies completely
They will become like a place for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 위한 곳이 될 것이다
